contents: *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2021.02.04. Article 1 (Enforcement Date) This regulation shall enter into force from the date of resolution by the Board of Directors. Article 2 (Transitional Measures) Commercial rights holders who have an ongoing contract with the Sports Council at the time of enforcement of this regulation shall be considered as commercial rights holders under these regulations. *Supplementary Provision No. 9999, 2022.06.16. Article 1 (Enforcement Date) This regulation shall enter into force from the date of resolution by the Board of Directors. Article 2 (Transitional Measures) Sponsorship holders who are still under contract with the IOC at the time of enforcement of this regulation shall be considered as sponsorship holders under this regulation.
